nodes.text: Legends spoke of a Voss who returned to the Deep Cradle, a ruin on the planet Voss that the Voss species believed was the place that their race was born from the substance of their planet. At the Deep Cradle, the male Voss supposedly drank from the fire at the heart of the planet, knowing that he would die in the process but sacrificing himself for the good of his species. The dying Voss's prophetic words were said to have guided the ancient Voss through the wilderness of their world to the mountain upon which they built the city of Voss-Ka.
